title: Tony Robbins x Robert Smith: The Power of the Playbook - Making Great Companies Extraordinary
description: In this debut episode of The Holy Grail of Investing podcast, Tony Robbins and Christopher Zook host Robert F. Smith, Founder and CEO of Vista Equity Partners. Smith reveals how he built a leading private equity firm managing over $100 billion, sharing insights on the role of engineering principles in investing and the transformative impact of AI on technology companies.
keyTakeaways: Vista Equity Partners' success is rooted in applying engineering principles to private equity investment strategy.
Robert F. Smith built one of the world's largest private equity firms with over $100 billion in assets under management.
AI is creating extraordinary efficiencies and reshaping operations in technology companies.
The power of a strategic playbook is essential for making great companies truly extraordinary.
Behind-the-scenes investor thinking provides rare insights into private market opportunities.
The podcast offers a new platform to democratize knowledge traditionally confined to closed-door investor conversations.
highlights: "Every extraordinary company is built on a foundation far deeper than surface-level success."
"AI is not just changing technology companies; it’s creating extraordinary efficiencies across the board."
"These conversations usually happen behind closed doors, and now we are making them available to a much broader audience."
